findings.rationale: A five-year duration may be insufficient for certain types of sensitive information, potentially exposing parties to risks of disclosure after the term ends.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond may lead to abuse, as one party can seek immediate remedies without any financial commitment or risk.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restrictions on assignment may limit flexibility in business operations and could pose risks if either party undergoes significant changes.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party
